messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] double posting
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/5/01 10:58:55 AM Pacific Daylight Time, kathyflorentz@hotmail.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/5/01 10:58:55 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
kathyflorentz@... writes:

<< I keep getting the messages a day late and then they come to my mailbox
twice. Is anybody else having this problem or is it just me? >>

Yeah I've had them more than twice. I think it has to do with all the
Yahoo problems...hopefully things will improve soon.

Lucy
